channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP Contact Slider
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP Contact Slider

item.title: CVE-2022-3237|2024-08-03T01:00:10.771Z -- unknown -- wp%20contact%20slider
item.description: The WP Contact Slider WordPress plugin before 2.4.8 does not sanitize and escape its settings, allowing high privilege users such as admin to perform cross-Site Scripting attacks even when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed.
